title: Added Ubuntu 22.04 install instructions
body: Just a small update to the README. Ubuntu instructions differ a little due to different default packages.
author: bjauny

comments.body:
> Thanks for adding the Ubuntu instructions. I hope the program works fine! Feel free to press the `merge` button whenever you can.

Actually I can't, I don't have the write access to your repo. :)

> > Thanks for adding the Ubuntu instructions. I hope the program works fine! Feel free to press the `merge` button whenever you can.

> Actually I can't, I don't have the write access to your repo. :)

my bad, I'll merge it then. Thank you!
